responsibilities.text: Learned Apache Maven, CI/CD, GIT, Spring Boot, Spring Data, Spring Security.
Designed projects applying SOLID principles and the most used Design Patterns.
Used Junit, Mockito to test code and followed best practices in the industry.
Used Docker to build Java Images and deploy Java apps
Implemented websites and landing pages from concept through deployment with JavaScript framework: ReactJS and CSS framework: Bootstrap.
Standardized all output with a responsive, mobile-first approach and increased number of applicants by 50%.
Created the user experience that fetched, parsed, and formatted data, and relayed it into React components.
Built mock designs for landing pages and contact pages with Figma.
Organized a group of 10 friends and colleagues; and founded an NGO that helped children with low economic resources to study during the COVID-19 pandemic.
Supervised and taught 20 high-school students in the areas of Algebra, Physics and Math.
Arranged several career fairs with various high schools and encouraged students to follow STEM majors.
